FuncDef:
The lastmember-queryinterval command sets a global interval for sending IGMP group-specific query messages after the IGMP querier receives an IGMP Leave message from a host.
The undo lastmember-queryinterval command restores the default value. The lastmember-queryinterval command sets a global interval for sending IGMP group-specific query messages after the IGMP querier receives an IGMP Leave message from a host. The undo lastmember-queryinterval command restores the default value. By default, the interval for sending IGMP group-specific query messages is one second.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the interval for sending IGMP group-specific query messages.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 5, in seconds.
